short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily clear selected cache items for the current site or whole browser with a single key press, right-click menu, or popup icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modern Manifest version 3 Chrome and Firefox Web Extension to easily clean selected cache items for specific sites or the whole browser with a single key press, from the right-click context menu or via the toolbar icon popup.

- Clear cache and reload site with a single key or button press
- Clear cache for a specific site or the whole browser
- Choose which cache items to clear or clear all data
- Works in Chrome, Firefox and on Android
- Automatic Light/Dark mode with theme switcher
